<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Combat Assessment](/Feats.aspx?ID=1721) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 126 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Butterfly Blade](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=91) (Level 4)

</column>

---

You make a telegraphed attack to learn about your foe. Make a melee Strike. On a hit, you can immediately attempt a check to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) about the target. On a critical hit, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the check to Recall Knowledge. The target is temporarily immune to Combat Assessment for 1 day.
name: Combat Assessment
